means: 原意：耶路撒冷的一个迦南要塞
后指锡安山、耶路撒冷、以色列的土地

sentence.Network_en: The law go from Zion the word of the LORD from Jerusalem.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为训诲必出于锡安,耶和华的言语必出于耶路撒冷.

sentence.Network_en: In Salem also is his tabernacle, and his dwelling place in Zion.
sentence.Network_cn: 在撒冷有他的帐幕, 在锡安有他的居所.

sentence.Network_en: Out of Zion, the perfection of beauty, God hath shined.
sentence.Network_cn: 2从全美的锡安中, 神已经发光了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: on zion , my holy hill ., 在锡安我的圣山上.
...红雨船：我会回法拉尼亚王都向到次一游将军报告的，你立刻带领剩下的部队去追击逃走的法拉尼亚骑士团！zion：遵命！第四章完
zion 基督教会, zion 神权政治, zion 希伯来语
ziob 齐奥布, zion 基督教会, ziolite 沸石

list.abs: 从城外看锡安门（ ZION GATE）的入口是呈现L型这主要是为了提高城门的安全性，在1948年的五月以色列独立战争中因为激烈的空 …

means.word_mean: 1. originally a stronghold captured by David (the 2nd king of the Israelites); above it was built a temple and later the name extended to the whole hill; finally it became a synonym for the city of Jerusalem;

sentences.sentence: "the inhabitants of Jerusalem are personified as `the daughter of Zion'"

means.word_mean: 2. Jewish republic in southwestern Asia at eastern end of Mediterranean; formerly part of Palestine
3. an imaginary place considered to be perfect or ideal
